Player History
Drafted in 38th round, 593rd overall pick, by Detroit in 2015...
Had first career hit on 8/24/2015, off Dennis Moore (MON)...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...

1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/31/2017 with a Fractured Hand, out for 3-4 weeks...

Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against San Francisco on 7/17/2018...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 5/4/2020...
Injured on 3/25/2022 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
